products.title: Vitra Blackout Beige 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Vitra blackout is one of their most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. Revamp your home or office space with a stunning vitra blackout beige vertical blind. Product id: sdb-vtb0428 fabric colour: beige material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes vitra blackout beige 89mm vertical blind in cream.

products.title: Beige Pvc Blackout Vertical Blind
products.description: The alicante range of blackout vertical blinds is made from high quality pvc. These blinds are just perfect for bathrooms and a very popular choice for kitchens, they are totally waterproof and wipe clean with ease. The alicante blinds are almost indestructible making them a the alicante range of blackout vertical blinds is made from high quality pvc.

products.title: Basix Blackout Alabaster Cream 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This cool-toned cream 127mm vertical blind, a traditional neutral shade, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and cream goes with nearly anything, whether its wooden accessories and floors or modern minimalist themes. Dress your bedroom or living room with this stylish vertical blind, which as well as being a blackout fabric is anti-allergy treated, to help you live out your days allergy-free.

products.title: Bella Blackout Mushroom Brown 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. products.title: Bella Blackout Beige 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. Bella blackout beige is a stunning beige shade, it will compliment wooden tones throughout the home. products.title: Luxari Pvc Blackout Beige 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their luxari pvc blackout range is available in classic colours and is ideal for damp rooms or areas that are exposed to heat. This beige vertical blind is made from a pvc fabric so is therefore waterproof and flame retardant - perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. Product id: sdb-vtb0971 fabric colour: beige material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes luxari pvc blackout beige 89mm vertical blind in cream.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Putty - Vertical Blind
products.description: The perfect cream shade, the sarra (blackout) in putty offers neutral elegance and can be blended with all kinds of colours. Its gently raised patterning adds texture and depth, preventing this blackout blind from being just another block-colour blind. For a neutral and unobtrusive colour scheme in the home office, that won't distract you from your work, mix the putty with mocha browns and cappuccino beiges - providing the perfect mood for that afternoon break's coffee.

products.title: Memphis Fr Honey (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition:polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
